mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tp_monitor_client (client_id, application_name, mac_addr, absolute_path, system_desc, ip, remark, system_url, tenant_id, actived, creator, create_time, updator, update_time, extend01, extend02, extend03, extend04, extend05) VALUES (#{clientId}, #{applicationName}, #{macAddr}, #{absolutePath}, #{systemDesc}, #{ip}, #{remark}, #{systemUrl}, #{tenantId}, #{actived}, #{creator}, #{createTime}, #{updator}, #{updateTime}, #{extend01}, #{extend02}, #{extend03}, #{extend04}, #{extend05})
mapper.select: SELECT tmc.client_id , tmc.application_name , tmc.mac_addr , tmc.absolute_path , tmc.system_desc , tmc.ip , tmc.remark , tmc.system_url , tmc.tenant_id , tmc.actived , tmc.creator , tmc.create_time , tmc.updator , tmc.update_time , tmc.extend01 , tmc.extend02 , tmc.extend03 , tmc.extend04 , tmc.extend05 FROM tp_monitor_client tmc WHERE tmc.ACTIVED = 1 and tmc.client_id = #{clientId}

select * from tp_monitor_client where actived = 1
and application_name = #{applicationName}
and mac_addr like concat('%', #{macAddr}, '%')
and system_desc like concat('%', #{systemDesc}, '%')
and ip like concat('%', #{ip}, '%')
and remark like concat('%', #{remark}, '%')
